messages.message:
Could anyone help adding details of database auth supported by our clients in this wiki (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PRE/pages/1708785735/Instabase+Infrastructure+Requirements) please?
This could be for db-init, control-plane and any other services we use which communicate with the database like job-service.

cc: @raghu / @Aakash Tewari / @Arpan / @Taha

Hey Sada — I believe https://docs.google.com/document/d/1op1n3ESOPa1vu0o-UaCQwVHO1f2Eah_2zax5aYnVIlA/edit#heading=h.ja6waadhfzkr has a lot of the documentation that you’re looking for. @Heymian maintains this doc.
All of the services use the same library / methods to communicate with the DB, so this will work for all of them.
